item.title: ~amoureux de livre_beauty add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: ~amoureux de livre_beauty add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: ~amoureux de livre_beauty add a quote by Confucius
item.description: "Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall." -- Confucius

item.title: ~amoureux de livre_beauty add a quote by Thomas A. Edison
item.description: "Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up." -- Thomas A. Edison

item.title: ~amoureux de livre_beauty add a quote by Booker T. Washington
item.description: "I have learned that success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome while trying to succeed." -- Booker T. Washington

item.title: ~amoureux de livre_beauty add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
item.description: "A flower may be beautiful all on its own, but a person is never truly beautiful unless someone's eyes show him that he is beautiful." -- Laurell K. Hamilton

item.title: ~amoureux de livre_beauty add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer
